title: Ttf goes bad in Linux
content:
Hi everyone,   
   
does anyone have experience with ttf fonts under Linux? I'm rounding up a typeface with a ttf version. I had 3 different people test this under Windows and it works perfectly. But someone under Linux has major problems with it. This is what he said:   
   
- The typeface is visible, he can select it but there is no preview   
- He tried to use the font with the following results:   
 \* terminal program crasher irreparable   
 \* mozilla webbrowser renders all the texts invisible   
   
This person is running everything under Linux and has a substantial amount of windows ttf fonts that he runs without any problems.   
   
I created this font with Fontographer 4.1.5 on a Mac with OS9.2.   
The encoding under Font Information is set to Windows.   
   
Does anyone have an idea what happens?   
   
Thanx,   
Ren
author: Rene Verkaart
